sentences.en: Beneath the festive mood there is an underlying apprehension.
sentences.cn: 在喜庆的背后存在着隐忧。

sentences.en: He felt a tremor of apprehension.
He may well have recalled with apprehension her ancient faculty of silence.
sentences.cn: 他想起她以前那种沉默的能耐,心里不觉恐慌起来.
她因为忧惧而浑身发毛。

sentences.en: I felt my stomach knot with apprehension.
I tensed every muscle in my body in apprehension.
I woke before the alarm, filled with apprehension.
sentences.cn: 我忧心忡忡，闹钟没响就醒了。

sentences.en: It reflects real anger and apprehension about the future.
sentences.cn: 这反映出对未来真正的愤怒和忧虑。

sentences.en: School reports are always received with some apprehension.
sentences.cn: 领取成绩报告单总是让人有些担心.

sentences.en: The boy was tied up inside in a knot of apprehension.
sentences.cn: 孩子的内心世界由于担忧而感到惴惴不安.

sentences.en: The Chief of the Secret Service watched the smoke with apprehension.
sentences.cn: 特工处长惴惴不安地注视着那股烟.

sentences.en: The thief, after his apprehension, escaped.
There is growing apprehension that fighting will begin again.
sentences.cn: 人们愈来愈担心会重开战火。

sentences.en: There is not the least apprehension of her coming.
sentences.cn: 一点都不必担心她会来.

sentences.en: There were still areas of doubt and her apprehension grew.
sentences.cn: 有些地方仍然存疑,于是她越来越担心.

sentences.en: They were filled with apprehension as they approached the building.
sentences.cn: 他们走近那幢建筑时,內心充满了恐惧.

sentences.en: They will begin to cooperate in the apprehension of these gangsters.
sentences.cn: 他们将合作捕捉这些歹徒.

words.tran_cn: 忧虑的；不安的；敏悟的；知晓的

trans.tran_cn: 不安，忧虑，忧惧，理解（力），领悟，了解，拘捕
trans.tran_en: the act of apprehending a criminal
